# Páramo AI

> OpenClaw Implementation Studio. We show you what's possible, then we build it.

Páramo AI builds custom AI automation for business owners using OpenClaw. We set up AI command centers, workflow automation, custom AI agents, data pipelines, smart outreach systems, and integration architecture.

## Services

- **OpenClaw Setup ($500):** Your own AI assistant, fully set up and ready to go. Runs 24/7, controllable from any messenger, 10 skills pre-installed.
- **Summit (Custom):** Full-stack AI infrastructure — unlimited automations, dedicated automation lead, custom AI agent development, integration architecture, white-glove onboarding.

## How It Works

1. Discovery Call — We map your workflows and identify highest-leverage automation opportunities.
2. We Build It — Custom automation designed, built, and tested with demos at every stage.
3. You Grow — We deploy, train your team, and provide ongoing support.

## Results

- 5x AI capacity from a single interface
- 40hrs saved per month on operations
- 98% client retention
- 120+ automations deployed
